title: Opportunity cost of cash rises with interest rates

content.question: Which of the following is true when interest rates rise?

choices.label: The opportunity cost of holding cash decreases.
The opportunity cost of holding cash increases.
The opportunity cost of holding cash stays the same.
The money demand curve shifts to the right.
The money supply curve shifts to the right.

content.answer: The opportunity cost of holding cash increases.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
